FILE: cm235434v11.0.txt
DYAD: PORTUGAL - BENIN
RIVALRY: RIV638
DISPUTE(S): MID2744 

PS-LAST-CHANGED: 20180213
PS-LAST-CHECKED: 20180213

Territorial-Maritime-Boundary Issues Variables

MID2744 

TERRMID: MID2744 1 -- territorial MID
TERRMID-CER: MID2744 1 -- certain 
TERRMID-NOTES: MID2744 from Gibler 2018, Benin had recently achieved independence and claimed the Portuguese territory of Ouidah, an enclave in Benin owned by Portugal. Benin occupied the area and forced the Portuguese out. Coded territorial MID because this was connected to a disputed piece of territory.

TERRLINK: MID2744 3 -- not third party link to territory 
TERRLINK-CER: MID2744 1 -- certain 
TERRLINK-NOTES: 

MARITMID: MID2744 3 -- not maritime 
MARITMID-CER: MID2744 1 -- certain 
MARITMID-NOTES: 

ISLMID: MID2744 3 -- not islands 
ISLMID-CER: MID2744 1 -- certain 
ISLMID-NOTES: 

CIVWARMID: MID2744 3 -- not civil war 
CIVWARMID-CER: MID2744 1 -- certain 
CIVWARMID-NOTES:

CIVWARLINK: MID2744 3 -- not civil war link 
CIVWARLINK-CER: MID2744 1 -- certain 
CIVWARLINK-NOTES: 

COUPMID: MID2744 3 -- not coup 
COUPMID-CER: MID2744 1 -- certain 
COUPMID-NOTES: 

COUPLINK: MID2744 3 -- not coup link
COUPLINK-CER: MID2744 1 -- certain 
COUPLINK-NOTES:
